title: Welp
body: Wonder what champs will get the SKT skins this year. *sigh*

replies.body: Couple more years and they'll be putting SKT skins on long forgotten champs even Riot doesn't remember exist like Master Yi.

> [{quoted}](name=KazaLyn Shao,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=oW5wQOTG,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-10-22T03:26:34.787+0000)
>
> Couple more years and they'll be putting SKT skins on long forgotten champs even Riot doesn't remember exist like Master Yi.

Whats a master yi?
i think thats a yorick skin
Im guessing poppy will get one
Just leave Ashe alone. Anything but SKT Ashe.
I came to the boards to make the same post....
